trans-unit.source: Exposes methods and properties to support UI Automation client access to controls that can cycle through a set of states and maintain a state once set.
trans-unit.target: 일련의 상태를 순환 하 고 설정 된 상태를 유지할 수 있는 컨트롤에 대 한 UI 자동화 클라이언트 액세스를 지원 하도록 메서드 및 속성을 노출 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Implemented on a UI Automation provider that must support the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TogglePattern> control pattern.
trans-unit.target: 지원 해야 하는 UI 자동화 공급자에서 구현 되는 <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TogglePattern>컨트롤 패턴.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.TogglePattern>

trans-unit.source: Cycles through the toggle states of a control.

A control must cycle through its toggle states in this order: <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ToggleState>, <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ToggleState>, and (if supported) <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ToggleState>.
trans-unit.target: 컨트롤을이 순서 대로 해당 설정/해제 상태를 순환 해야 합니다: <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ToggleState>, <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ToggleState>를 (지원) 하는 경우 및 <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ToggleState>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.ToggleState> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.ToggleState> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.ToggleState>

trans-unit.source: Gets the toggle state of the control.

A control must cycle through its <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ToggleState> in this order: <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ToggleState>, <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ToggleState>, and (if supported) <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ToggleState>.
trans-unit.target: 컨트롤을 순환 해야 합니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ToggleState>이 순서로: <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ToggleState>, <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ToggleState>를 (지원) 하는 경우 <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ToggleState>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.ToggleState> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.ToggleState> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.ToggleState> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.ToggleState>
